00001 #ifndef OENGINE_INPUT_DISPATCHER_H
00002 #define OENGINE_INPUT_DISPATCHER_H
00003 
00004 #include "dispatch_map.hpp"
00005 #include "func_binder.hpp"
00006 #include <mangle/input/event.hpp>
00007 #include <assert.h>
00008 
00009 namespace OEngine {
00010 namespace Input {
00011 
00012 struct Dispatcher : Mangle::Input::Event
00013 {
00014   DispatchMap map;
00015   FuncBinder funcs;
00016 
00021   Dispatcher(int actions) : funcs(actions) {}
00022 
00023   void bind(unsigned int action, int key)
00024   {
00025     assert(action < funcs.getSize());
00026     map.bind(key, action);
00027   }
00028   void unbind(unsigned int action, int key)
00029   {
00030     assert(action < funcs.getSize());
00031     map.unbind(key, action);
00032   }
00033   bool isBound(int key) const { return map.isBound(key); }
00034 
00039   typedef DispatchMap::OutList _O;
00040   void event(Type type, int index, const void* p)
00041   {
00042     // No bindings, nothing happens
00043     if(!isBound(index))
00044       return;
00045 
00046     // Get the mapped actions and execute them
00047     const _O &list = map.getList(index);
00048     _O::const_iterator it;
00049     for(it = list.begin(); it != list.end(); it++)
00050       funcs.call(*it, p);
00051   }
00052 };
00053 
00054 // This helps us play nice with Mangle's EventPtr, but it should
00055 // really be defined for all the classes in OEngine.
00056   typedef boost::shared_ptr<Dispatcher> DispatcherPtr;
00057 
00058 }}
00059 #endif
